announcements.title: Important notice of the classes
announcements.description: The classes are held in virtual method due to the present pandemic, Greetings, I hope you are well

announcements.title: Weekly meeting
announcements.description: We meet to talk about different topics, among them we want to know what is the performance of the virtual classes

announcements.title: Communicate for parents
announcements.description: Communicate to the parents of the students that the classes for tomorrow will take place in person

announcements.title: Change of holidays
announcements.description: There will be no holidays for next month.
